data.name: Yawmi
data.description: Yawmi is Levant-inspired home-made goodness. Our meals and bowls are prepared every day with love and 100% fresh ingredients. We love our planet and that is why all our containers are 100% recyclable, including our cutlery.

selected_locations.areaORCity: Burj Khalifa, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
Unnamed Road, Jallo Village Jallo, Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan

data.delivery_minimum_amount_message:
A delivery fee of AED 7 will be added to orders less than AED 60 
 
 Please add 60 to your order for free delivery or continue with AED 7 delivery fee.

products.name: Fattouch
products.description: Mix of fresh green leaves with chopped tomato, cucumber, and radish, served with a pomegranate dressing

products.name: Quinoa Tabouleh
products.description: Chopped fresh parsley, tomato, spring onion, and quinoa, served with a lemon & olive oil dressing

products.name: Quinoa Market Salad
products.description: Quinoa, lettuce, avocado, green apple, pumpkin seeds, and pomegranate seeds, topped with feta cheese and served with a mustard vinaigrette

products.name: Shredded Kale & Pumpkin Bowl
products.description: Shredded kale, roasted pumpkin, spring onion, dried cranberries, and pumpkin seeds, topped with feta cheese served with a lemon vinaigrette sauce

products.name: Mixed Berry & Spinach Bowl
products.description: Lettuce, spinach, pomegranate, raspberries, dried blueberries, walnut & avocado, in a pomegranate molasses dressing

products.name: Oriental Rice with Chicken
products.description: Seasoned minced beef is cooked with rice and oriental spices, served with chicken breast and your choice of gravy sauce or yogurt

products.name: Dawood Basha (Meatballs)
products.description: Levantine style meatballs and caramelised onions cooked in a tomato broth, served with vermicelli rice

products.name: Baked Kafta & Potatoes
products.description: Layers of tomato slices and kafta are cooked in a tomato sauce with caramelised onions, served with vermicelli rice

products.name: Sheikh L Mehshe (Baby Stuffed Aubergines)
products.description: Stuffed baby aubergines are filled with seasoned caramelised meat and toasted nuts and cooked in a fresh tomato broth, served with vermicelli rice

products.name: Mloukhiyye with Chicken
products.description: Mallow leaves slow cooked in our home-made chicken broth, topped with chicken and served with white rice, toasted bread & an onion vinaigrette

products.name: Shish Barak (Beef Dumplings with Yoghurt)
products.description: Beef dough dumplings cooked in a yogurt sauce, garnished with coriander and served with white rice

products.name: Chicken Mousakhan Rolls
products.description: Shredded chicken with summac & caramelised onions, rolled in our very thin markouk bread & served with yogurt

products.name: Bemye & Riz (Baby Okra Stew)
products.description: Baby okra cooked in a tomato broth, topped with beef cubes and served with vermicelli rice and condiments

products.name: Kafta bil Laban
products.description: Oriental style kafta cooked in a tomato sauce, topped with yogurt, toasted nuts, and served with vermicelli rice

products.name: Grilled Salmon
products.description: Grilled salmon fillet, served with baked vegetables and our special aromatic dill sauce

products.name: Potato Souffle
products.description: The Levantine version of shephard’s pie, served with a shredded cabbage and tomato salad

products.name: Cauliflower Lasagna (Vegetarian)
products.description: Layers of bolognese sauce and bechamel topped with a melted mix of cheese

products.name: Kibbeh bil Sayniye
products.description: Kibbeh with burghol wheat spread out in a tray layered with seasoned minced beef, served with a minted yogurt and cucumber salad

products.name: Kibbeh Labniye (Kibbe Dumplings with Yoghurt)
products.description: Kibbeh dumplings cooked in a yogurt sauce, garnished with coriander and served with white rice

products.name: Shish Barak & Kibbeh
products.description: Beef dumplings & kibbeh cooked in a yogurt sauce, garnished with coriander and served with white rice

products.name: Classic Combo
products.description: Your choice of main dish, one side and a dessert
